notes: The LLM incorrectly classified the contract as safe with 0 findings. However, the contract contains a HIGH severity flash_loan vulnerability in the isGranted function. The vulnerability allows users to bypass the minimum voting power requirement by using flashloans - the function checks token.balanceOf(_who) which includes flashloaned tokens, enabling proposal spam without actual locked stake. The ground truth correctly identifies this as a critical issue requiring the fix to only use lockManager.getLockedBalance(_who) instead of the sum with token.balanceOf.
